internships.desc: Worked in an interdisciplinary group of hybrid computer scientists, designers, and artists at the FLuid Interfaces, MIT Media Lab. Worked on Mixed Reality based educational apps and wearables that can decode what the mind is thinking.
Developed a design tool for urban planners to predict the cognitive response to city spaces based on their. Worked in an interdisciplinary group of hybrid computer scientists, designers, and artists.
I was the Product Design intern at Witworks, a tech startup in Bangalore. I worked on their second product called 'Blink', an IoT wearable that provide access to services on-the-go.

As a maker intern, I developed 'The Musical Facade', a dynamic screen that responds to music with motion. I did hands-on programming, electronic design, digitial fabrication to materialize my ideas into things.

conferences.name: Smartgeometry 2016
conferences.desc: I was selected in the '20,000 Blocks' Cluster headed by DU Darmstadt at Smartgeometry 2016. We worked on a gamified architectural platform to allow non-architects be an active part of the design process while having fun.

conferences.name: Smartgeometry 2014
conferences.desc: In the 2014 edition, I was part of the 'Design Space Exploration' Cluster headed by ETH Zurich. We worked on devising algorithms that automated urban planning by taking subjective user input into consideration.
